    id
    step
    state
    requestFormState

  adminLead
  archivedAt

  businessNeed

  currentStage
  decisionNextSteps
  eaCollaborator
  eaCollaboratorName
  euaUserId
  existingFunding
  grbDate
  grtDate
  id
  lcid
  lcidExpiresAt
  lcidScope
  lcidCostBaseline
  needsEaSupport
#   notes

  oitSecurityCollaboratorName

  projectAcronym
  rejectionReason
  requestName
  requestType
#   requester
#   status
  submittedAt
  trbCollaborator
  trbCollaboratorName
  updatedAt
  grtReviewEmailBody
  decidedAt
  businessCaseId
#   lastAdminNote
  cedarSystemId
#   documents
  hasUiChanges
    
    
  }
  
  
}

item.name: SystemIntake Get All w/ Related Requests

graphql.query:
query systemIntake {
  systemIntake(id:"{{systemIntakeID}}")
  {
    step
    state
    requestFormState
    draftBusinessCaseState
    grtDate
    grtMeetingState
    finalBusinessCaseState
    grbDate
    grbMeetingState
    decisionState
    statusAdmin
    statusRequester
    itGovTaskStatuses {      
        intakeFormStatus
        feedbackFromInitialReviewStatus
        bizCaseDraftStatus
        grtMeetingStatus
        bizCaseFinalStatus
        grbMeetingStatus
        decisionAndNextStepsStatus
    }
  }
}

mutation createTRBRequest{
  
  createTRBRequest(requestType: FOLLOWUP ){
    id
    name
    archived
    type
    status
    taskStatuses {
        formStatus
        feedbackStatus
        consultPrepStatus
    }
    form {
        id
        trbRequestId
        component
        needsAssistanceWith
        hasSolutionInMind
        whereInProcess
        hasExpectedStartEndDates
        collabGroups

        createdBy
        createdAt
        modifiedBy
        modifiedAt
    }
    createdBy
    createdAt
    modifiedBy
    modifiedAt
    
    
  }
  
  
}

query TRBRequestGetByID{
  
  trbRequest(id: "{{trbRequestID}}"){
    id
    name
    archived
    type
    status
    taskStatuses {
        formStatus
        feedbackStatus
        consultPrepStatus
    }
    feedback {
        id
        trbRequestId
        feedbackMessage
        copyTrbMailbox
        notifyEuaIds
        action
        createdBy
        createdAt
        modifiedBy
        modifiedAt
    }
    createdBy
    createdAt
    modifiedBy
    modifiedAt
    # form {
    #     status
    #     id
    #     trbRequestId
    #     component
    #     needsAssistanceWith
    #     hasSolutionInMind
    #     whereInProcess
    #     hasExpectedStartEndDates
    #     collabGroups

    #     createdBy
    #     createdAt
    #     modifiedBy
    #     modifiedAt
    # }
    attendees{
        id
        euaUserId
        # userInfo {
        #     euaUserId
        #     commonName
        #     email
        # }
        trbRequestId
        component
        role
    }
    
    
  }
  
  
}

mutation {
  updateTRBRequestForm(input: {
    trbRequestId: "{{trbRequestID}}",
    isSubmitted: true
    component: "Drive Through",
    needsAssistanceWith: "Stuff",
    hasSolutionInMind: true,
    proposedSolution: "Instead of coming in the restaurant, drive through it!",
    whereInProcess: OTHER,
    hasExpectedStartEndDates: true,
    expectedStartDate: "2022-10-13T15:15:20.358346Z",
    expectedEndDate: "2022-10-13T15:15:20.358346Z",
    collabGroups: [SECURITY, CLOUD, OTHER]
    collabDateSecurity: "2022-12-13T15:15:20.358346Z",
    collabDateEnterpriseArchitecture: "2022-12-13T15:15:20.358346Z",
    collabDateCloud: "2022-12-13T15:15:20.358346Z",
    collabDatePrivacyAdvisor: "2022-12-13T15:15:20.358346Z",
    collabDateGovernanceReviewBoard: "2022-12-13T15:15:20.358346Z"
    collabDateOther: "2022-12-13T15:15:20.358346Z",
    # collabGroupOther: "The restaurant advisory board",
  }) {
        trbRequestId
        
        component
        needsAssistanceWith
        hasSolutionInMind
        proposedSolution
        whereInProcess
        hasExpectedStartEndDates
        expectedStartDate
        expectedEndDate
        collabGroups
        collabDateSecurity
        collabDateEnterpriseArchitecture
        collabDateCloud
        collabDatePrivacyAdvisor
        collabDateGovernanceReviewBoard
        collabDateOther
        collabGroupOther
        status

        createdBy
        createdAt
        modifiedBy
        modifiedAt
  }
}

mutation CreateTrbRequestFeedback($input: CreateTRBRequestFeedbackInput!) {
  createTRBRequestFeedback(input: $input) {
        id
        trbRequestId
        feedbackMessage
        copyTrbMailbox
        notifyEuaIds
        action
        createdBy
        createdAt
        modifiedBy
        modifiedAt
  }
}

pm.test("CedarApiUrl is set  (Can be found in .envrc)", function() {

graphql.query:
query {
  cedarSystems{
    id
    name
    description
    acronym
    atoEffectiveDate
    atoExpirationDate
    status
    businessOwnerOrg
    businessOwnerOrgComp
    systemMaintainerOrg
    systemMaintainerOrgComp
    isBookmarked
  }
}

query($systemID: String!) {
  cedarAuthorityToOperate(cedarSystemID: $systemID) {
    cedarId
    uuid
    actualDispositionDate
    containsPersonallyIdentifiableInformation
    countOfTotalNonPrivilegedUserPopulation
    countOfOpenPoams
    countOfTotalPrivilegedUserPopulation
    dateAuthorizationMemoExpires
    dateAuthorizationMemoSigned
    eAuthenticationLevel
    fips199OverallImpactRating
    fismaSystemAcronym
    fismaSystemName
    isAccessedByNonOrganizationalUsers
    isPiiLimitedToUserNameAndPass
    isProtectedHealthInformation
    lastActScaDate
    lastAssessmentDate
    lastContingencyPlanCompletionDate
    lastPenTestDate
    piaCompletionDate
    primaryCyberRiskAdvisor
    privacySubjectMatterExpert
    recoveryPointObjective
    recoveryTimeObjective
    systemOfRecordsNotice
    tlcPhase
    xlcPhase
  }
}

query GetDeploymentsBySystem($cedarSystemId: String!, $deploymentType: String, $state: String, $status: String){
    deployments(cedarSystemId: $cedarSystemId, deploymentType: $deploymentType, state: $state, status: $status) {
        id
        name
        systemID
        startDate
        endDate
        isHotSite
        description
        contractorName
        systemVersion
        hasProductionData
        replicatedSystemElements
        deploymentType
        systemName
        deploymentElementID
        state
        status
        wanType
        dataCenter {
            id
            name
            version
            description
            state
            status
            startDate
            endDate
            address1
            address2
            city
            addressState
            zip
        }
    }
}

query cedarSystemDetails($cedarSystemId: String!) {
    cedarSystemDetails(cedarSystemId: $cedarSystemId){
        cedarSystem {
            id
            name
            description
            acronym
            status
            businessOwnerOrg
            businessOwnerOrgComp
            businessOwnerRoles {
                application
                objectID
                roleTypeID
                assigneeType
                assigneeUsername
                assigneeEmail
                assigneeOrgID
                assigneeOrgName
                assigneeFirstName
                assigneeLastName
                assigneePhone
                assigneeDesc
                roleTypeName
                roleTypeDesc
                roleID
                objectType
            }
            systemMaintainerOrg
            systemMaintainerOrgComp
            versionId
        }
        systemMaintainerInformation {
            agileUsed
            adHocAgileDeploymentFrequency
            authoritativeDatasource
            businessArtifactsOnDemand
            dataAtRestEncryptionKeyManagement
            deploymentFrequency
            devCompletionPercent
            devWorkDescription
            ecapParticipation
            frontendAccessType
            hardCodedIPAddress
            ip6EnabledAssetPercent
            ip6TransitionPlan
            ipEnabledAssetCount
            legalHoldCaseName
            locallyStoredUserInformation
            majorRefreshDate
            multifactorAuthenticationMethod
            multifactorAuthenticationMethodOther
            netAccessibility
            networkTrafficEncryptionKeyManagement
            noMajorRefresh
            noPersistentRecordsFlag
            noPlannedMajorRefresh
            omDocumentationOnDemand
            plansToRetireReplace
            quarterToRetireReplace
            recordsManagementBucket
            recordsManagementDisposalLocation
            recordsManagementDisposalPlan
            recordsUnderLegalHold
            sourceCodeOnDemand
            systemCustomization
            systemDataLocation
            systemDataLocationNotes
            systemDesignOnDemand
            systemProductionDate
            systemRequirementsOnDemand
            testPlanOnDemand
            testReportsOnDemand
            testScriptsOnDemand
            yearToRetireReplace
        }
        businessOwnerInformation {
            beneficiaryAddressPurpose
            beneficiaryAddressPurposeOther
            beneficiaryAddressSource
            beneficiaryAddressSourceOther
            beneficiaryInformation
            costPerYear
            editBeneficiaryInformation
            isCmsOwned
            nr508UserInterface
            numberOfContractorFte
            numberOfFederalFte
            numberOfSupportedUsersPerMonth
            storesBankingData
            storesBeneficiaryAddress
        }
        roles {
            application
            objectID
            roleTypeID
            assigneeType
            assigneeUsername
            assigneeEmail
            assigneeOrgID
            assigneeOrgName
            assigneeFirstName
            assigneeLastName
            assigneePhone
            assigneeDesc
            roleTypeName
            roleTypeDesc
            roleID
            objectType
        }
        deployments {
            id
            name
            systemID
            startDate
            endDate
            isHotSite
            description
            contractorName
            systemVersion
            hasProductionData
            replicatedSystemElements
            deploymentType
            systemName
            deploymentElementID
            state
            status
            wanType
            dataCenter {
                id
                name
                version
                description
                state
                status
                startDate
                endDate
                address1
                address2
                city
                addressState
                zip
            }
        }
        threats {
            alternativeId
            controlFamily
            daysOpen
            id
            parentId
            type
            weaknessRiskLevel
        }
        urls {
            id
            address
            isBehindWebApplicationFirewall
            isAPIEndpoint
            isVersionCodeRepository
            urlHostingEnv
        }
    }
}

query GetExchanges($cedarSystemId: String!) {
    exchanges(cedarSystemId: $cedarSystemId) {
    connectionFrequency
    containsBankingData
    containsBeneficiaryAddress
    containsPhi
    containsPii
    containsHealthDisparityData
    dataExchangeAgreement
    dataFormat
    dataFormatOther
    exchangeDescription
    exchangeEndDate
    exchangeId
    exchangeName
    exchangeRetiredDate
    exchangeStartDate
    exchangeState
    exchangeVersion
    exchangeDirection
    fromOwnerId
    fromOwnerName
    fromOwnerType
    isBeneficiaryMailingFile
    numOfRecords
    sharedViaApi
    toOwnerId
    toOwnerName
    toOwnerType
    typeOfData {
        id
        name
    }
    }
}
